IIIF Manifests by C. Pitta - Exhibition of 19th c prints by W. Daniell RA

  • IIIF Manifests by C. Pitta - Exhibition of 19th c prints by W. Daniell RA
  • ceciliapilar87@gmail.com
  • cpitta

As part of my Masters Thesis in Information Sciences (NOVA), this website has the goal to showcase the possibilities of IIIF Manifests to a small exhibition of 19th centuries prints.
